ygData.subject: Re: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: This would be great unless it is indeed server side lag, then there would be no way to recreate it.  If you could get it to work repeatedly you could go to the
ygData.messageBody:
This would be great unless it is indeed server side lag, then there would be
no way to recreate it. If you could get it to work repeatedly you could go
to the bottom of a dungeon and pull what ever mob you wanted and run it back
to the zone entrance and fight it.


> 1) While I wasn't there he didn't engage in combat.
> 2) He didn't move to follow until after the server knew where I was.
> 3) I saved about 400 hitpoints of damage that I usually take during that
> run.
